application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 3 (Facing Materials) of planning permission 20/00658/HOU the proposal fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extension) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted in 2012.

Due to the insufficient information submitted to assess for Condition 4 (Planting plan for sedum roof) of planning permission 20/00658/HOU the proposal would not be in the interests of visual amenity and therefore in conflict with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Due to insufficient information submitted to assess for Condition 5 (Boundary treatment) of planning permission 20/00658/HOU the proposal fails to protect the amenities and privacy of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Discharge of Condition 3 (Facing Materials), 4 (Planting plan for sedum roof) and 5 (Boundary treatment) of Planning Permission ref: 20/00658/HOU (Erection of a part single storey part two storey side and rear extension with 3 x roof lights) dated 17/06/2020.
